headline: Innovation in Every Drop
aboutParagraph1: BMI is a medical manufacturer located in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Equipped with the latest and most advanced machinery that meets cGMP standards, we are confident in our ability to deliver innovative and high-quality products, including customized formulations tailored to client needs.
aboutParagraph2: We are licensed to produce Cosmetics, Medical Devices, and Health Products by the SFDA, and meet global standards such as ISO 9001:2015, ISO 13485:2016, and cGMP.
visionText: To be one of the top 10 Medical Companies in KSA and MENA region within 5 years, expanding internationally within a decade.
missionText: Build long-term partnerships by offering top quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction.
